Package org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.model

Class Card

java.lang.Object
org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.model.Card
@Entity public class Card extends Object
Represents a card associated with an account.

The Card class is used to model a card associated with a financial account. It includes fields for a unique identifier, card number, and card type. The class uses JPA annotations to define its persistence behavior and Jackson annotations for JSON serialization.

The class uses the following annotations:

  • @Entity - Marks the class as a JPA entity.
  • @Table - Specifies the table name in the database.
  • @Id and @GeneratedValue - Define the primary key and its generation strategy.
  • @Schema - Provides metadata for API documentation purposes.
  • @JsonProperty - Manages JSON serialization and deserialization behavior.
  • @Enumerated - Specifies that an enumeration should be stored as a string in the database.

  • Field Details

    • cardId

      private Long cardId
      The unique identifier of the card.

      This auto-generated value uniquely identifies a card record in the database.

    • cardNumber

      private String cardNumber
      The number of the card.

      This field contains the card number used for transactions. It is a string to accommodate different card formats.

      example 378282246310005

    • cardType

      private CardType cardType
      The type of card.

      This field represents the type of card (e.g., CREDIT, DEBIT) and is stored as a string in the database.
